entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
